DOC.detailed_description: Fibromyalgia affect million Americans , yet FDA approve drug treat debilitate condition . Besides cause pain , also disrupt normal sleep pattern many victim . Pain lack sleep reinforce , make patient progressively miserable . Xyrem potent hypnotic induces consolidate sleep . In small study Xyrem report offer relief fibromyalgia patient . This trial design test hypothesis . Patients enroll study stop take prescription medication fibromyalgia ( over-the-counter pain reliever permit ) . They take either Xyrem alone placebo alone . Patients follow eight week evaluate relief pain functional impairment fibromyalgia study treatment . Sleep characteristic also assess subjectively polysomnographic recording baseline twice treatment phase .
